scripts.build:frontend: cd ..\frontEnd\react-app && npm install && npm run build
scripts.copy:frontend: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src=path.join('..','frontEnd','react-app','dist');const dst='public';fs.rmSync(dst,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.mkdirSync(dst,{recursive:true});const copy=(s,d)=>{fs.readdirSync(s,{withFileTypes:true}).forEach(e=>{const sp=path.join(s,e.name);const dp=path.join(d,e.name);if(e.isDirectory()){fs.mkdirSync(dp,{recursive:true});copy(sp,dp);}else{fs.copyFileSync(sp,dp);}})};if(fs.existsSync(src))copy(src,dst);else{console.error('No existe dist, ejecute build:frontend');process.exit(1);} "
scripts.build:app: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.package:win: npm run build:app && pkg --compress GZip --targets node18-win-x64 --out-path dist server.js
